import { Component } from "react";
import { TransformWrapper, TransformComponent } from "react-zoom-pan-pinch";


:::note Interactive Image

The image below can be panned and zoomed using your mouse or the provided buttons.
To reset the image to the original size on the page click <img width="12px" height="12px" src={props.resetPic} alt="Reset Image"/>.
If you wish to view the full image on a separate page, click this <a href={props.imageSource} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">link</a>.

:::

<TransformWrapper 
    defaultScale={1}
>
    {({ zoomIn, zoomOut, resetTransform, ...rest }) => (
        <React.Fragment>
            <div className="tools">
                <button onClick={() => zoomIn()}><img width="15px" height="15px" src={props.zoomInPic} alt="Zoom In"/></button>
                <button onClick={() => zoomOut()}><img width="15px" height="15px" src={props.zoomOutPic} alt="Zoom Out"/></button>
                <button onClick={() => resetTransform()}><img width="15px" height="15px" src={props.resetPic} alt="Reset Image"/></button>
            </div>
            <TransformComponent>
                <img src={props.imageSource} alt={props.imageAlt} />
            </TransformComponent>
        </React.Fragment>
    )}
</TransformWrapper>
